Basic features this series servo unit: The control algorithms the permanent-magnet synchronous servo motor and asynchronous spindle servo motor are integrated, the motor parameters can set adapt the permanent-magnet synchronous servo motor and asynchronous spindle servo motor.

Due the high-speed real-time communication with the CNC through GSK-Link fieldbus, the connection simplified, and the transmission distortion analog signals and pulse signals can avoided.

The servo unit also supports the real-time monitoring, parameter management and servo parameter tuning through the CNC Various control modes are supported: position, speed, position/speed and torque control modes.

Two position feedback input interfaces are provided, supporting encoder communication protocols (e.g.

BISS, Endat2.2 and Tamagawa) and incremental encoders.

The absolute incremental grating rulers can connected for full closed-loop control.

This product has strong overload drive capability and large brake pipe capacity. can connected with the external brake resistor, with high starting and braking speeds.

Three voltage levels, i.e. 220V, 380V and 440V are available adapt different power grids. 1.1 Product Model Confirmation Check each item after receiving the products immediately based items listed below. there are any problems, please contact the supplier GSK.

This not only simplifies the debugging the servo rigidity the machine tool, but also avoids the previous debugging based the experience debugging personnel.

The minimum value recommended. --- Page 84 --- GR-L Series Bus-type Servo Drive Unit User Manual trap Mechanical systems usually involve large part tolerances, assembly gaps, part frictions, and certain dynamic imbalances, which will lead inherent vibration the machine.

Resonance may occur when the vibration frequency the motor certain speed close the inherent vibration frequency the machine. this case, the trap can applied suppress resonance.

The trap capable reducing the gain specific frequency suppress mechanical resonance.

The accurate resonance frequency must available order use the trap correctly.

Where the resonance frequency often subject deviation, the trap will not apply.

Hence, the trap suitable for resonance.

The greater the trap width and depth, the strong capabilities resonance suppression will be.

However, the phase lag may occur, resulting system instability.

Thus, the parameters can modified properly suppress vibration.

Key points for trap use: When PA77 the “real-time detection resonance frequency” the servo unit will enabled.

The detected frequency shown the PA76 parameters and dP-rPS Note Due the real-time calculation, the program running time long, flickering the LED display normal.

Note recommended run the machine tool the entire stroke, order obtain the resonance frequency with the largest amplitude.

Write the frequency value displayed PA76 into PA78 enable resonance suppression. resonance not suppressed completely, PA78, PA79 and PA80 can subject fine adjustment obtain good suppression effects.

After the suppression the first group frequencies, the servo unit will still automatically detect the resonance frequency and the detected frequency will still displayed PA76. the case different from the previous frequency, the frequency value can written into PA81, followed the suppression the second group frequencies.

Similarly, fine adjustment can conducted PA82 and PA83 the case incomplete suppression.

After the resonance suppression, set PA77 and save it.

Another purpose disable the function real-time frequency detection, order save the program running time.

Note PA77 not set, the servo unit will continue detecting the real-time resonance frequency. lot servo resources will consumed for data calculation, which will inevitably cause the decline the performance the servo unit. --- Page 85 --- Chapter Operation --- Page 86 --- 数控 GR-L Series Bus-type Servo Drive Unit User Manual The parameter range the permanent-magnet synchronous motor different CHAPTER FUNCTION DEBUGGING from that the asynchronous spindle motor, their debugging methods are 6.1 Basic Performance Parameter Debugging similar.

Otherwise, the default parameters the motor must called according the corresponding model code Appendix The parameter characteristics and debugging methods are described below.

Proportional gain PA15 speed loop (the same for PA45 and PA48): the recommended debugging range 50-600.

Increase settings Advantages: Adjustment accelerated due the speed overshoot.

The rigidity increases the motor overshoot decreases.

Disadvantage: This likely cause vibration the motor and resonance the mechanical device, accompanied the vibration sound arising from mechanical vibration.

Decrease settings Advantages: The impact the mechanical device decreases when the load inertia large.

Disadvantage: the PA15 value small, the speed overshoot will increase, which likely cause the swinging vibration the mechanical device and the dull and heavy vibration sound.

The disturbance load adjusted slowly.

Adjustment skills The default parameters can changed time determine the approximate range, followed fine adjustment.

Increase settings Advantages: The response speed commands accelerated, and the rigidity the motor strengthened.

Disadvantage:

The case where the spindle speed the servo spindle controlled called spindle rotation 和 control (the spindle rotated the speed command S); the case where the position the spindle controlled called spindle contour control (the spindle rotated the movement command). contour control function involves contour control the spindle.

Switching between spindle rotation control and contour control depends the output signal from the PLC.

The manual and automatic operation the contour control axis the same the normal servo axis the contour control mode. 8.4.1 Contour Control Axis Setting When the position parameter (No37#7 SCS)=“1", contour control function effective, and contour the spindle may controlled.

The axis that performs contour control configured one the CNC control axes.

Note: The system fixes the 5th axis the contour axis and the number CNC control axes must set and this number cannot changed. 8.4.2 Switching Between Spindle Rotation Control and Contour Control Switching from spindle rotation control contour control; When the contour control switching signal CON (G033#4) "1", the spindle becomes the contour control axis.

When switching contour control performed during spindle rotation, the spindle stops immediately and switching performed.

Switching from contour control spindle rotation control; When the contour control switching signal CON (G033#4) "0", the spindle becomes the spindle rotation control axis.

The switching performed after confirming that the movement command the spindle for both the automatic operation and the manual operation has been completely ended. alarm issued when switching performed during the movement the spindle. 8.4.3 Contour Control Axis Setting For Interpolation For servo axes that are interpolated with the contour control axis, axes can selected, and only linear interpolation available. 8.4.4 Contour Control Axis Reference Point Returning When the position parameter (No37#5 CsZR)=“0”, the reference point return function the contour control axis invalid.

After the reference point positioned, the reference point return completion signal ZP5 (F094#4) becomes "1".

Automatic operation mode G00 command After the servo spindle switched the contour control mode, the servo spindle performs the reference point return operation when the GOO command executed without performing the reference point return operation. the case GOO command, the servo spindle returns the reference point.

After the reference point return completed, the reference point return completion signal ZP5 (F094#4) becomes "1" and positioned the command position.

The GOO command that executes one more reference point return operations becomes the normal positioning operation.

The difference between GOO based reference point return and G28-based manual reference point return that, the reference point always positioned the manual and 全 G28-based reference point return operation，while the case G00, the arbitrary command position can located.

G28 command After the servo spindle switched contour control mode, the case command G28, the spindle moves the intermediate point after the spindle motor stops.

Then, the reference point return operation performed, and after the reference point positioned, the reference point return completion signal ZP5 (F0946#4) becomes "1".

When performing reference point return operation after the servo spindle switched the contour control mode, perform the operation positioning the reference point and set ZP5 "1".

Reference point return interrupt Inthe manual operation mode, the reference point return operation can interrupted when the reset, emergency stop, feed axis direction selection signal set "0".

The reference point return operation after the interruption re-executed from the beginning.

Inthe automatic operation mode, the operation can interrupted reset, emergency stop, feed hold, and on. any case, the reference point return operation after the interruption re-executed from the beginning. 8.4.5 Contour Control Axis Operation (Automatic/Manual) case the contour control mode, after performing the reference point return, the axis can operated the same way the normal servo axis.

However, under the spindle rotation control method, the axis does not operate control axis. alarm issued during automatic operation (PS0197). addition, regarding manual operation with respect the contour control axis, please process PLC ladder timing the like that does not operate the spindle rotation mode.

--- Page 175 --- Chapter Machine Tool Debugging This chapter introduces some methods and steps GSK218MC system installation, debugging 4.1 Debugging Preparation GSK218MC debugging may performed the following steps System connection: correct connection the basis for the smooth debugging the system; PLC debugging: validate system security function (such emergency stop, hard limit, etc.) and operation function; Driver unit parameter setting: set motor model, parameters, control methods, etc.

System parameter setting: set control parameters, speed parameters, etc.

Data backup: after the system debugged, data backup such parameter backup, compensation data backup, and backup PLC program shall performed.

Precautions before GSK218MC debugging and operation ensure that all cables are properly connected, check the polarity the freewheeling diodes the relay, solenoid valve, etc.

Check the connection phase sequence the motor high-voltage cable; One-to-one correspondence between position control cable, code wheel feedback cable and motor high-voltage cable servo feed device; Confirm the type analog voltage code received the spindle unit; Confirm that all ground wires are connected reliably; Confirm the validity the emergency stop button and the emergency stop circuit.

Make sure the feed can disconnected after the emergency stop button pressed the emergency Press the emergency stop button ensure that all air switches the system are disconnected; Close the main power air switch the electric cabinet; Turn the 24V air switch fuse check whether the DC24V power supply normal; Check the power supply other parts; Power the GSK218MC control unit. 4.3 Emergency Stop and Limit This system has the software limit function.

The backlash compensation must accurately compensated improve the accuracy the machining.

Therefore, not recommended measure the backlash the screw rod with the MPG single step method.

For details, see “4.7.9 Incremental value compensation rotary axis mean value (one-way) compensation mode”. 4.8 Mechanical Zeroing (Machine Tool Zeroing) Mechanical zero (machine tool zero) concept The machine tool coordinate system the inherent coordinate system the machine tool.

The origin the machine tool coordinate system called the mechanical zero (or machine tool zero). also called the reference point this manual. the mechanical origin specified the machine tool manufacturer and usually installed the maximum travel the positive direction the X-axis, Y-axis, Z-axis, 4TH axis, and 5TH axis.

When the numerical control device powered on, the mechanical zero not known, and automatic manual zeroing required generally.

There are two types zeroing modes: After the block; Before the block. set the position parameter NO: 6#1. 二 There are two zeroing methods: with one-turn signal; without one-turn signal. set the 一 position parameter N0: 6#6. case zeroing without motor one-turn signal, the zeroing method divided into two types: A-type and B-type. set the position parameter NO: 6#7. 4.8.1 Mechanical Zeroing Under Pulse Mode 179 --- Page 194 --- 32: GSK218MC Machining Center CNC System PLC and Installation Connection Manual Zeroing deceleration signal DEC (G17.0-G17.4 Coded disc one-turn signal nPC Start Mechanical zero 小 小 由 When servo motor with coded disc used (setting position parameter NO.64#6=1, A/B-type block, and the front and rear logics the block are the same): The system executes mechanical zeroing.

The machine slide plate moves towards the set zeroing direction with distance I.1 and speed data parameters P100-104.

The acceleration and deceleration time constants are data parameter P3S2 (applicable for the whole axis).

When the zeroing switch senses the zeroing block, the zeroing deceleration signals G17.0-G17.4 are effective.

When the sensor switch leaves the zeroing block, the system immediately decclerates the speed set data parameter P99, and waits the coded disc one-turn signal (nPC).

The system stops when the nPC signal received, and sets this point (Point the mechanical zero.

Limit rotation speed fluctuation and allow for maximum rotations error.

For cutting soft materials (such aluminum alloy and copper), use spiral screw tap, along with coolant for better effect.

The requirements the ladder diagram for machine tool with disc type tool magazine The machine tool has spindle tool automatic clamp/unclamp device, which provided with normally open in-place detection switch.

The capacity the tool magazine less than 100.

The tool magazine can rotate forward and backward.

The tool magazine has counter switch, tool pot vertical in-place detection switch, and tool pot horizontal in-place detection switch.

The tool magazine has zero return switch (optional).

The machine manufacturer sets the machine zero for each machine.

The coordinate system set with the machine zero the origin called the machine coordinate system.

After power turned on, manual return the machine zero performed establish the machine coordinate system.

Once the machine coordinate system set, remains unchanged until the power turned off, the system restarted, the emergency stop pressed.

The system adopts the right-hand Cartesian coordinate system.

The vertical movement the spindle direction Z-axis movement.

Viewing from the spindle the workpiece, the spindle box Z-axis negative movement approaching workpiece and Z-axis positive movement leaving workpiece.

The remaining directions are determined the right-hand Cartesian coordinate system. 2.4.2 Reference Point fe) CNC machines, there special position where tool change usually takes places the coordinate system set, called the reference point. fixed point the machine coordinate system set the machine manufacturer.

With the reference point return function the tool can easily moved this position.

With the reference point return function the tool can easily moved this position.

Generally, the reference point the CNC milling machine system coincides with the machine zero, and the machining center reference point usually the tool change point. 号 Keterence point Tool Workbench Fig. 2-4-2-1 move the tool the reference point, there are two ways: Manually return the reference point (see “Chapter Zeroing Operation’); Automatically return the reference point. 2.4.3 Workpiece Coordinate System The coordinate system used when machining workpiece called workpiece coordinate system (also called part coordinate system).

The workpiece coordinate system preset the CNC (setting the workpiece coordinate system). 所一 一 Program Command Coordinate system Machining drawing CNC system Machine --- Page 26 --- GSK218MC Series Machining Center CNC System Programming and Operation Manual Fig. 2-4-3-1 The tool cuts the workpiece into the shape indicated the drawing the CNC command workpiece coordinate system according the command program the programmed coordinate system the machining drawing.

The relative relationship between the machine coordinate system and the workpiece coordinate system must determined.

The method determining the relative relationship between those two coordinate systems called alignment.

Different methods can used depending the shape parts and the number parts machined.

For details, see 4.2.8 this chapter. 2.4.4 Absolute Coordinate Programming and Relative Coordinate Programming There are two methods defining the axis movement amount: absolute value and relative value.

The absolute value definition method programming with the coordinates the end position the axis movement, called absolute coordinate programming.

The relative value definition method directly programming with the axis movement amount, called relative coordinate programming (also called incremental coordinate programming).

Absolute coordinates The coordinates the target position the specified workpiece coordinate system, that is, the coordinate position which the tool moved.

Interference check ro) Excessive cutting the tool called “interference”.

Interference can used pre-check excessive tool cutting.

The system will give alarm interference detected the syntax check after the program loaded in. set Position Parameter NO: 41#6 whether interference check performed during radius compensation.

Basic conditions for interference: (1) The movement distance the program segment for tool radius compensation smaller than the tool radius. (2) The tool path direction different from the program path direction. (The angle between the paths between 90° and 270°). (3) During arc machining, addition the above conditions, the angle between the start point and the end point the tool center path greatly different from the angle between the start point and the end point the program path (180° more).

For restrictions specifying several codes the same program segment mechanical operation, see the machine tool manufacturer’s manual. 133 --- Page 150 --- 人 尖 GSK218MC Series Machining Center CNC System Programming and Operation Manual 5.1 Code Controlled PLC When the code controlled PLC shares the same segment with the movement code, the code will executed simultaneously with the movement code. 5.1.1 Spindle Rotation and Ccw Commands (M03, M04) Code: M03 (M04) Description: According applicable standards, the spindle rotation CCW defined forward rotation and the rotation reverse rotation.

M03 means rotation while M04 means rotation CCW.

The code refers the speed the spindle, the gear position case gear control.

Unit: r/min When controlled frequency converter, refers the actual speed, for example: $1000 means that the spindle rotates speed 1000 r/min. 5.1.2 Spindle Stop Code Command (M05) Code: M05.

When M05 executed automatically, the spindle will stop rotating.

However the speed 吕 specified the code will reserved.

The deceleration mode which the spindle stops 了 和 rotating depends the machine tool manufacturer’s settings.

Usually, dynamic braking. 5.1.3 Cooling and Off (M08, M09) 己
Code: M08, make the cooling water pump on.

M09, make the cooling water pump off. the automatic mode, the auxiliary function lock used, the pump control code not executed. 5.1.4 A-Axis Unclamping and Clamping (M10, M11) Code: M10, unclamping axis M11, clamping axis 5.1.5 Tool Control Unclamping and Clamping (M16, M17) Code: M16, tool control unclamping M17, tool control clamping 5.1.6 Spindle Orientation and Cancellation (M18, M19) Code: M18, cancel the spindle orientation M19, spindle orientation for tool replacement positioning 5.1.7 Tool Search Code Command (M21, M22) Code: M21, tool search code when returning the tool; M22, tool search code when clamping the new tool. 5.1.8 Tool Magazine Return Code Command (M23, M24) Code: M23, which makes the tool magazine placed the spindle position; M24, which make the tool magazine return the original position. 5.1.9 Rigid Tapping (M28, M29) Code: M28, cancel rigid tapping M29, rigid tapping 134 --- Page 151 --- Chapter Auxiliary Functions Code 5.1.10 Spiral Chip Conveyor and Off (M35, M36) Code: M35, make the spiral chip conveyor on.

M36, make the spiral chip conveyor off. 5.1.11 Chip Flush Valve and Off (M26, M27) Code: M26 start the chip flush valve; M27 close the chip flush valve. 5.1.12 Spindle Blowing and Off (M07, M09) Code: M07, make the spindle blowing on.

M09, make the spindle blowing off. 5.1.13 Start and End Automatic Tool Replacement(M50, M51) Code: M50, control the start automatic tool replacement.

M51, control the end automatic tool replacement. fe) 5.2 Code For Program Control The code for program control classified into main program control and macro program control.

When the code used for program control shares the same segment with the movement code, first executed the movement code and then the code.

Note: M00, M01, M02, MO6, M30, M98, M99 codes cannot specified together with other codes, otherwise the system will give alarm.

When these codes share the same segment 区 with other non-M codes, first executed are the non-M codes and then the codes.

Such codes include those which cause CNC send the codes themselves the machine tool and perform internal operations, such codes that invalidate the read-ahead function program segment. addition, the codes, which only allow CNC send the codes themselves the machine tool without performing internal operations, can specified the same program segment. 5.2.1 Program End and Return (M30, M02) the automatic operation mode, when the program runs M30 (M02), the automatic operation will stop.

After that, there any program that will not executed and the spindle and cooling operation will stop, the number machined workpieces will increased M30 can use Position Parameter NO: 33#4 control whether return the program header, and M02 can use Position Parameter NO: 33#2 control whether return the program header.

MO2 and M30 are the end subprogram, will return the program calling the subprogram and continue execute the following program segment.

This system does not support manual multi-axis simultaneous movement, but supports simultaneous zeroing each axis.

Note: The manual feed speed each axis set P98 parameter. 4.1.2 Manual Fast Movement nuv Press the RAPID key light the indicator light, and then enter the manual fast movement status, then press the feed direction axis key make each axis run the fast running speed.

Note The manual fast movement speed set P170 P173.

Note The manual fast movement set the position parameter NO:12#0 valid before returning the reference point. 4.1.3 Speed Selection For Manual Feed and Manual Fast Movement manual feed, the manual feed override can selected the band switch for total levels (0%--200%). the manual fast movement, 218MC, 218MC-H, 218MC-V can select the manual rapid “AVEO 50% 0.001 0.01 0.1 movement speed override according which the rapid override has four levels, including Fo, 25%, 50%, 100%.

The speed set the data parameter P93).

Note: The fast override selection effective for the following movement speeds. (1) GOO fast feed (2) Fast feed the fixed cycle (3) Fast feed G28 (4) Manual fast feed For example: When the fast feed speed m/min, the override 50%, the speed m/min. 4.1.4 Manual Intervention Manual intervention can performed when the program switched the manual mode through feed hold when running under the automatic, entry, and DNC modes.

Move each axis, and then switch the mode which the previous program running after the action completed.

When pressing 226 --- Page 243 --- Chapter Manual Operation 图 key run this program, the axes will quickly return the original manual intervention point G00 mode and then continue run the program.

Detailed description: the single-segment running carried out during the return running, the tool will perform single-segment pause the manual intervention point. alarm reset occurs during manual intervention return, this function will canceled.

After touches the deceleration switch, the zeroing speed each axis set the data parameters P342-P346.

After breaking away from the block, continues inquiring the one-turn signal position pulse the speed set the data parameters P342-P346 and decelerates and stops until detects the above data; then, returns the mechanical zero (ie, the reference point) the speed set the data parameter P354.

When returns the mechanical zero, the coordinate axis stops moving and the zeroing indicator light on.

Example: Take the high-speed increment zeroing the 1st axis example.

The 1st axis starts hit the block with higher speed F4000 (data parameter P100 set 4000), and passes through the block F500 (data parameter P342 set 500) after touching the deceleration switch.

After breaks away from the block, inquires the one-turn signal position pulse the speed F500 and decelerates and stops until detects the above data; then, returns the mechanical zero (ie, the reference point) the speed F200 (data parameter P354 set 200), shown the Fig. 9-4-2-1.

The smaller the coefficient, the smaller the curve error.

The system detects both the traditional spindle servo drive orientation signal and the spindle orientation mechanical position confirmation signal during the tool-change.

I/O unit X48.6 the input point the spindle orientation mechanical position confirmation signal.

The machine manufacturer can install the corresponding orientation positioning detection switch based upon the actual case the machine spindle, (It recommended adopt the approximate switch value M8, and the detection distance more than 1mm).

Which detection method (concave protrude) decided the machine manufacturer.

The parameter 3004.7 the CNC can selected the constant open close mode the detection switch (The factory default parameter 3004.7=0, constant open switch, concave detection). the constant close switch and performed concave detection, set the PC3004.7=1 (that reverse).

Use communication software gskcomm-M This section only briefly describes the GSKComm-M functions that may used the machine tool manufacturer during the machine tool debugging process.

For detailed instructions for GSKComm-M, please refer the "GSKComm-M Instructions for Use" the software CD.

GSKComm-M communication management software specially provided for machine tool manufacturers.

The interface shown Fig. 1-84. can realize the functions uploading and downloading files between and CNC, DNC communication, CNC parameter editing, part program management and editing, tool compensation and screw compensation viewing, ladder diagram editing and other functions.

The higher the efficiency the time.

When the acceleration/deceleration time constant the same, the higher the start/end speed acceleration/deceleration, the faster the acceleration/deceleration process, the greater the impact the machine tool movement, the higher the processing efficiency; the lower the start/end speed acceleration and deceleration, the slower the acceleration/deceleration process, the smaller the impact the machine tool movement, and the lower the processing efficiency.

The principle acceleration/deceleration adjustment appropriately reduce the acceleration /deceleration time constant and increase the start/stop speed acceleration and deceleration the premise that the drive unit does not alarm, the motor does not lose step and the machine tool movement has obvious impact, improve the processing efficiency. the acceleration/deceleration time constant set too small, and the acceleration/deceleration start/end speed set too high, easy cause the drive unit alarm, the motor out step, the machine tool vibration.

There are two ways control the spindle speed, which can selected parameters.

The first use communication control the servo drive unit when connecting the GSK-Link spindle.

The second use the analog voltage output port the extended I/O unit output and send analog voltage 10V the spindle servo drive device inverter.

Infinitely variable speed can achieved matter which method adopted.

Although command the spindle speed, the actual control object the spindle motor.

Therefore, CNC must have certain correspondence between the speed and grade the spindle motor.

This system determines the gear stage currently used the machine tool gear selection signals (GR1, GR2), and CNC outputs the spindle speed corresponding the gear stage.

The parallel program function can triggered the signal call the specified program. addition, the parallel program can loaded the main program and then executed. auxiliary function, this function can executed parallel with the automatic running program.

The parallel program function currently only supports G00, G01, G04, G28, G35, instructions and most auxiliary codes.

Note Parallel program function does not support M99 instruction.

Note The motion instructions the parallel program cannot conflict with the main program being executed. 2.12.1.
